text: Add an option to specify the symbol to use when exporting to a GPX file.
Remove deprecated URL shortener service from the permalink dialog.
Remove Thunderforest's map tile service, since we're exceeding their free service limit.
Add context menu to the map and the markers.
Bootstrap 4.0; language selection via dropdown list.
Fix resizing issues (menubar partially occluded map on narrow displays).
Allow for Url parameters that have been encoded multiple times.
More relaxed language detection; this hopefully fixes translation issues.
Use HTML5 "color" inputs for editing marker colors. Works fine in modern browsers.
Color of markers is now configurable.
